clearcontrol.core.math.argmax

Class UnivariateFunctionArgMax

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.core.math.argmax.UnivariateFunctionArgMax

  • public class UnivariateFunctionArgMax
extends java.lang.Object
    Univariate function argmax. Utility class offering static methods to compute the mode-based argmax of univariate functions.
    Author:
    royer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UnivariateFunctionArgMax()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double argmax(double[] pX, org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.UnivariateFunction pUnivariateFunction, int pNumberOfSamples)
      Returns the argmax for a given range of x value and a univariate function.
      static double argmaxmean(double[] pX, org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.UnivariateFunction[] pUnivariateFunctions, int pNumberOfSamples)
      Returns the mean argmax for a given range of x value and a list of univariate functions.
      static double argmaxmedian(double[] pX, org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.UnivariateFunction[] pUnivariateFunctions, int pNumberOfSamples)
      Returns the median argmax for a given range of x value and a list of univariate functions.

    • Method Detail

      • argmax

        public static double argmax(double[] pX,
                            org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.UnivariateFunction pUnivariateFunction,
                            int pNumberOfSamples)
        Returns the argmax for a given range of x value and a univariate function.
        Parameters:
        pX - List of x values, only the first and last are considered and used to define a range [xmin,xmax].
        pUnivariateFunction - univariate function
        pNumberOfSamples - Number of samples to compute within [xmin,xmax]
        Returns:
        argmax

      • argmaxmedian

        public static double argmaxmedian(double[] pX,
                                  org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.UnivariateFunction[] pUnivariateFunctions,
                                  int pNumberOfSamples)
        Returns the median argmax for a given range of x value and a list of univariate functions.
        Parameters:
        pX - List of x values, only the first and last are considered and used to define a range [xmin,xmax].
        pUnivariateFunctions - list of univariate functions
        pNumberOfSamples - Number of samples to compute within [xmin,xmax]
        Returns:
        median of argmax values

      • argmaxmean

        public static double argmaxmean(double[] pX,
                                org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.UnivariateFunction[] pUnivariateFunctions,
                                int pNumberOfSamples)
        Returns the mean argmax for a given range of x value and a list of univariate functions.
        Parameters:
        pX - List of x values, only the first and last are considered and used to define a range [xmin,xmax].
        pUnivariateFunctions - list of univariate functions
        pNumberOfSamples - Number of samples to compute within [xmin,xmax]
        Returns:
        mean of argmax values
